Package me.chloe.raiderlib.builders

Class MovingPart

java.lang.Object
me.chloe.raiderlib.builders.MovingPart
public class MovingPart extends Object
Constructor to make using PID control with multiple motors a lot more basic and standard. A MovingPart instance allows for the ability to create static motor states that are all grouped under a specific part.

      public MovingPart addMotor(MotorControllerSimple motor)

    • addMotors

      public MovingPart addMotors(MotorControllerSimple... ms)
      Add an Array of motors to the part's list of motors
      Parameters:
      ms - Array of MotorControllerSimple separated by commas
      Returns:
      this (MovingPart) to be used as a builder.
